spr-networks/super

Micro-segmentation for WiFi routers

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Python scapy-based tool for WiFi penetration
  • central hub for managing torrent and usenet indexers across media apps
  • printable wifi cards with qr codes for easy sharing
  • Network pings, network tools, interface management, local device discovery
  • Locates WiFi networks using BSSID and SSID data
  • Detects trackers via BLE and WiFi scanning
  • Maps networks and estimates distances
  • Network equipment shapes for draw.io
